message: Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to purchase my product. It's worth a significant amount to me, no less than $800,000, and I know it holds equal value to you. I'm confident this product will be a valuable asset for your business. To make this transaction mutually beneficial, I'm offering it to you for $850,000. This price reflects the value of the product and allows for a fair return on my investment. Please let me know your decision by [date/time].
